I am a junior sysadmin with main focus on linux and freebsd. To make a living I sometimes do web developement and small b2b digital office solutions like nextcloud, onlyoffice, vpn and moodle LMS. In the mean time I love tinkering with new things in linux and BSD and even sometimes compiling my own android custom roms with custom android apps.
